snippet.title: 5 Facts About Johnny Depp And Amber Heard Dispute
snippet.description:
5 Facts About Johnny Depp And Amber Heard Dispute

The love story between Johnny Depp and Amber Heard begins in the 2011 when they met on film The Rum Diary. Their relationship ends up in a wedding that the two hold on 2015. However after just 12 months, their love story was turn over. They underwent a divorce trial which is quite complicated and raises the pros and cons among fans. On today’s video we have list some facts about Johnny Depp and Amber Heard dispute.

1. The leak of their conversation to the public
The Hollywood couple heats up the public when a recording of their conversation is shared. According to USA Today, the conversation is mostly about a domestic violence in the household. The public are shocked upon hearing the conversation and the news following the couple’s divorced news.

2. Both parties claim to be victims of domestic violence
Johny and amber have been together for 15 months and have to go through a divorce process that takes up to two years. Amber Heard sued for divorce from Johny Depp in 2016 saying that she was a victim of domestic violence. She also support her claim by giving out some evidences (several photos of bruises and the testimony of her younger brother in court). A year later, Depp and his lawyer filed an appeal and reported that he was the victim of domestic violence while bringing up a recorded conversation between the two. Depp stated that Amber can’t control herself when she was drunk that leads to domestic violence.

3. Depp pays an allowance of USD 7 million or equivalent
Amber Heard received USD 7 million as an allowance from Johny. This allowance was later granted by the court. Their complicated divorce process has become attention of many people.

4. Depp was detained because he was considered a threat to Heard
Depp was briefly detained by the authorities for several months before filing an appeal and filing a lawsuit for defamation to Heard. He was detained as he was considered a threat to Heard.

5. Depp lost his role in the film and Heard received criticism and petitions
The couple’s divorced story not only make them sad but they also lost some of their jobs. When filling out for divorce, Depp had just completed filming Pirates of the Caribbean. When his divorce news spread all over the globe the film got canceled and he lost the role of Jack Sparrow which rise his name as a Hollywood actor. The same thing happened to Heard. When this case heats up again in mid-2020, Heard is criticized and petitioned for not playing any role and many also criticized her appearance in the film Aquaman 2.

More about me, please subscribe this channel and our official social media. Hopefully enjoy our channel mega news!
